page.title: 13NOTABLE EVENTS
page.content: In January 1984 a new road linking Llanelli with the M4 was opened by Colin Jones, the Welsh Sports Personality of the Year.The road runs close to our school and it is hoped that it will provide a much needed boost to Llanelli's economy.The road is 3.5 miles long and cost Â£7 million for Thyssen's to construct. The project was financed with the aid of the Welsh Office and the E.E.C. and is the first phase of a huge road modernising programme for Llanelli. Phase 2 is already underway, with the aim of attracting a variety of industries and employment to the area.
